contest-event.event-date: Feb. 2, 2020 D Durham League Contest (Section A) Durham League Contest (Section A) 10 Test Piece Contest Durham League Contest durham-league-contest-section-a The 2010 contest, due to take place on 5th December, was cancelled due to heavy snow. (4barsrest news article) Lubetkin Theatre, East Durham College, Peterlee Best Soprano - Michelle Meldrum (Houghton Brass) Best Principal Cornet - Tina Mortimer (Ferryhill Town) Best Percussion Section - GT Group Peterlee Best Middle of the Band - Houghton Brass Best 2nd Section Band - Bearpark & Esh Colliery Winning Conductor - John Roberts (GT Group Peterlee) Jan. 27, 2020, 8:32 p.m. Feb. 2, 2020, 7 p.m. 1 GT Group Peterlee John Roberts 2 Houghton Brass Brian Adams 3 Bearpark and Esh Colliery Phillip Tait 4 Wansbeck's Ashington Colliery Band Nigel Steadman 5 North Skelton Band Gareth Sykes 6 Ferryhill Town Tom Maddison
